definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The preserved ham made by the local farmers is from the farm pigs which called "field fat".
sentences.chinese: 鄉親們做臘肉用的豬，就是被當地稱爲地油子的土豬。
